ShiWan game operating management system

Shiwan game operating management system is designed for game operators to help them work more efficiently.

In this system,you can manage user's info,orders and configurations of the game.

Using this system,game operators can see the informations of the users coming from differnt platforms. The informations of the users includes the game register time,the time when user last recharged,login time and other key infomations for the users.

So this system can help operators find high value users easily and mark them as key users.

If there is anything wrong with user's orders,they can use this system to compensate user's loss.

This system helps company to create more revenues and help game opreators to do a better work.

l worked as a product manager in this projects.
